org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.selection

Class BestPenaltyCriterion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.selection.BestPenaltyCriterion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultiCriteriaBranchAndBoundSelection.SelectionComparator, MultiCriteriaBranchAndBoundSelection.SelectionCriterion

    public class BestPenaltyCriterion
extends Object
implements MultiCriteriaBranchAndBoundSelection.SelectionCriterion
    A simple weighting multi-criteria selection criterion only optimizing on the over-expected penalty. This criterion is used to find a bound on the over-expected penalty to ensure no suggestion given to the student.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller
